body.name: Portable Handheld Mini Travel Fan Rechargeable, Small Neck Lanyard Electric Fan Battery Operated for Women, Foldable Desk Cooling Fans with LED Screen 6000mAh Power Bank and USB Cable - Black
features: 🔋 Portable Personal Fan - Built-in 6000mAh Power Bank: 6000mAh Battery ensures that the fan can have a long working time of 1-6 speeds, which can be transformed into a charging bank when necessary to power up your phone, computer, and other electronic devices.

🧊 Handheld Fan with 6 Speeds Running Quiet: Mini cooling fan needs only 2 seconds to help you drive away the heat. Wind speed 1-5 gradually increases, and speed 6 is irregular wind speed, just like nature's uncontrollable natural wind. Noise <15db, super quiet operation, even will not bother your little sleeping baby.

🖥️Digital Display Allows You to Handle the Power at Any Time: The screen will have a clear display of the gear and remaining power, so you have absolute control over the wind speed and remaining power, you can avoid the power suddenly being depleted. Suitable for the elderly and children to use, easy to remind them to charge in time.

🌀 3 Ways to Use Meets Different Occasions Needs: Foldable fan can be standing or folded up on the desktop in the office or at home; when shopping or walking you can also hold the fan for cooling precise body parts; if you want to free your hands, DauMeiQH neck fan can install the nylon rope accessory can be turned into a neck hanging fan in seconds.

🌻 Summer Good Partner: The fan and rechargeable battery function is only 200g in weight, and the compact size can easily fit into your daily bag. Reduce the weight of your bag while also allowing you to have a cool breeze, no longer need to bring a fan and a rechargeable battery in the summer heat. Perfect for family, students, men and women as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how I feel about the string. Doesn’t always stay on.But out of other fans I have purchased- this is my fav

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST SMALL HANDHELD POWERED FAN!!
reviews.reviewText: First off, I bought this for myself due to hot flashes. This is the 5th little fan I've bought and is by far the BEST quality of any of them. I say it's the BMW of handheld fans! It has 6 speeds and performs very well. It has a C charging port and a USB. I really like that I can hang it around my neck or I can set it on a table during use. If you want a good quality fan get this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ultra portable cooling
reviews.reviewText: I love battery powered fans. Especially the ones with powerbank sized batteries. Although I don't use the powerbank feature, I know there is plenty of battery capacity on these types. This one is no different.Obviously, the higher the capacity of battery, the larger and bulkier it will be. This fan has a 6000ah battery which is pretty impressive for a fan that is light enough to carry around your neck. It's not heavy and you can walk around with it and for get that it's there because its really light.I'm not going to go over the features because you can read about that in the description. I will, however, share some things that is not there. I haven't really tested every speed and how long the battery lasts because I use the fan intermittently through the day. I so use this camping for white noise and cooling so I know that it will last all though the night on speed 1 (9+hrs). I also know that if you leave this on speed 5, which is the highest constant speed, it will last only about 1.5 hours.I've used this for camping, fishing, music festivals, amusement parks, and airplane trips. Basically this thing is a life saver if you must be out in the heat of summer. I bought one for each family member before we went to Busch Gardens last month and they all thanked me for making standing in lines in 90° heat much more bearable. We just stuck them all in a small backpack when we got to the ride. I gave myself a pat on the back for bringing it on a recent plane trip to Boston. I had one stop in Charlotte and both planes were delayed on the tarmac. They both were struggling to keep the cabin cool while on the ground so it was HOT sitting there, but I had my fan around my neck and stayed cool. I turned it off just to see if it made a difference and it was unbearable!The only reason I knocked one star off is because I wish that it was more efficient with battery power on the highest setting. On really, really hot days, you need the high speed to get the best cooling relief. I realize it's probably not realistic to expect something this small and light to push large amounts of air for hours.That being said, I would go ahead and get one for yourself and try it out. Get an additional one for a gift to anyone. They'll love it!I hope this information has been helpful to someone 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan saved me over the summer and is still kept in my purse for embarrassing hot flashes. It’s a bit on the heavy side and a little larger than others I have tried. Nice having an extra power bank available as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't have that much power
reviews.reviewText: Last year's model was stronger pushed out more air, which is the second photo, much more air power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thankful for this one!
reviews.reviewText: This little fan has enough power, flexibility, & features for a very hot summer trip to Italy!!! Ordered several & keeping them but this particular fan is THE BEST! Really thankful I ordered this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan has a great battery life. I have used it several times and it never disappoints.
Great for stuffy venues, airports, planes, trains and even a tour bus! I use it for beside fan and even to dry my hair in a pinch. So yes, I love these fans.
I travelled to Europe where the temperatures were very hot and there was very little air conditioning. This multi speed fan was incredibly helpful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pleasing design, but one minor peeve
reviews.reviewText: The first 2 settings are not strong enough in this heat. I like to start with the 3rd setting. Design is nice and has a good finish. I also get to see the battery level so knowing if it needs recharging is a great bonus.The only downside I find a bit annoying is the vibration, which is stronger than the normal handheld fan. You can feel your hand and forearm vibrating as well after holding it for a while.Battery life: #3 consumes 1% battery life every 90 seconds, so it will last about 2.5 hours. #1 consumes about 1% battery life every 5 minutes.Note: the sticker is not part of the design.
Purchased for a friend, best friend now !
Small, compact, large battery capacity, and quiet. Mrs. loved it.
